Content:: Houdini is a 1998 television film about the life of the magician Harry Houdini, directed and written by Pen Densham. It stars Johnathon Schaech, Stacy Edwards, Paul Sorvino and David Warner. It debuted on the TNT Network in December 1998.[1][2] The film details the life, relationships and exploits of the famous magician. The DVD is available as part of the burn-on-demand Warner Archive service.[3]  This article related to an American TV movie is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
